meanings.sent1: The document had an asterisked section for important notes.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the asterisked items at the bottom of the page.
meanings.sent3: The asterisked paragraph made the text look like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her asterisked notebook stood out among the plain ones.
meanings.sent5: The asterisked words glowed on the page, drawing attention.

meanings.sent1: He asterisked the key points in his notes for easy reference.
meanings.sent2: They asterisked the errors in the document before printing.
meanings.sent3: She asterisked her favorite recipes in the cookbook.
meanings.sent4: The teacher asterisked the correct answers on the test.
meanings.sent5: The map was asterisked to show the locations of hidden treasures.
